spoiler_log.Progressive Beam:
Area 4 - Crystal Mines - Diggernaut Excavation Tunnels
Area 1 - Temple Exterior
Area 7 - Spider Boost Tunnel North
spoiler_log.Grapple Beam: Area 1 - Metroid Caverns Alpha Arena North East
spoiler_log.Lightning Armor: Area 2 - Dam Exterior - Metroid Caverns Entrance
spoiler_log.Beam Burst: Area 2 - Dam Exterior - Inner Alpha Arena
spoiler_log.Progressive Suit:
Area 4 - Crystal Mines - Diggernaut Excavation Tunnels
Area 4 - Central Caves - Transit Tunnel
spoiler_log.Bomb: Area 4 - Central Caves - Transport to Areas 3 and 4 Crystal Mines
spoiler_log.Power Bomb Launcher: Area 3 - Factory Exterior - Blob Thrower Boulevard
spoiler_log.Progressive Jump:
Area 1 - Destroyed Armory
Area 2 - Dam Entryway - Entryway Teleporter
spoiler_log.Baby Metroid: Area 4 - Central Caves - Transport to Area 5
spoiler_log.Energy Reserve Tank: Area 1 - Metroid Caverns Alpha Arena South East
spoiler_log.Metroid DNA 3: Area 2 - Dam Exterior - Metroid Caverns Alpha Arena South West
spoiler_log.Metroid DNA 4: Area 3 - Metroid Caverns - Alpha+ Arena North

hints.text: The Lightning Armor can be found in Area 2 - Dam Exterior.
The Power Bomb Launcher can be found in Area 3 - Factory Exterior.
The Super Missile Launcher can be found in Area 1.
The Bomb can be found in Area 4 - Central Caves.
A Progressive Beam can be found in Area 4 - Crystal Mines.
The Baby Metroid can be found in Area 4 - Central Caves.
The Screw Attack can be found in Area 5 - Tower Lobby.
A Progressive Beam can be found in Area 7.
The Ice Beam can be found in Area 2 - Dam Interior.
A Progressive Jump can be found in Area 1.
